dublin_core.dcvalue: Panel Mobile Money and mFinance One of the key intentions of Sustainable Development Goal 3 is to achieve universal health coverage including financial risk protection and access to essential services and medicine Despite of this realization it s critical to note that majority of people cross low income countries have constrained access to health care However new approaches in health financing are emerging Join these panelists to learn about different ways digital programs can support finance including digital payments in an emergency situation such as Ebola citizen feedback to strengthen results based financing and digital savings cards to increase access to care Presented by Gabala Franco Deputy Executive Director in Charge of Program Ugandan NGO Health Child
Made available in DSpace on 2020-06-22T10:14:19Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 1 frank_balidawa_star_life_card.ppt: 2379776 bytes, checksum: a3058c33a851211c4de8514f296a1ff6 (MD5)
